6
7// Shader.h: Defines the abstract gl::Shader class and its concrete derived
8// classes VertexShader and FragmentShader. Implements GL shader objects and
9// related functionality. [OpenGL ES 2.0.24] section 2.10 page 24 and section
10// 3.8 page 84.
11
12#ifndef LIBANGLE_SHADER_H_
13#define LIBANGLE_SHADER_H_
14
15#include <list>
16#include <memory>
17#include <string>
18#include <vector>
19
20#include <GLSLANG/ShaderLang.h>
21#include "angle_gl.h"
22
23#include "common/Optional.h"
24#include "common/angleutils.h"
25#include "libANGLE/Caps.h"
26#include "libANGLE/Compiler.h"
27#include "libANGLE/Debug.h"
28#include "libANGLE/angletypes.h"
29
30namespace rx
31{
32class GLImplFactory;
33class ShaderImpl;
34class ShaderSh;
35class WaitableCompileEvent;
36} // namespace rx
37
38namespace angle
39{
40class WaitableEvent;
41class WorkerThreadPool;
42} // namespace angle
43
44namespace gl
45{
46class CompileTask;
47class Context;
48class ShaderProgramManager;
49class State;
50
51// We defer the compile until link time, or until properties are queried.
52enum class CompileStatus
53{
54 NOT_COMPILED,
55 COMPILE_REQUESTED,
56 COMPILED,
57};
58
59class ShaderState final : angle::NonCopyable
60{
61 public:
62 ShaderState(ShaderType shaderType);
63 ~ShaderState();
64
65 const std::string &getLabel() const { return mLabel; }
66
67 const std::string &getSource() const { return mSource; }
68 const std::string &getTranslatedSource() const { return mTranslatedSource; }
69
70 ShaderType getShaderType() const { return mShaderType; }
71 int getShaderVersion() const { return mShaderVersion; }
72
73 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getInputVaryings() const { return mInputVaryings; }
74 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getOutputVaryings() const { return mOutputVaryings; }
75 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getUniforms() const { return mUniforms; }
76 const std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> &getUniformBlocks() const { return mUniformBlocks; }
77 const std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> &getShaderStorageBlocks() const
78 {
79 return mShaderStorageBlocks;
80 }
81 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getActiveAttributes() const { return mActiveAttributes; }
82 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getAllAttributes() const { return mAllAttributes; }
83 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getActiveOutputVariables() const
84 {
85 return mActiveOutputVariables;
86 }
87
88 bool compilePending() const { return mCompileStatus == CompileStatus::COMPILE_REQUESTED; }
89
90 const sh::WorkGroupSize &getLocalSize() const { return mLocalSize; }
91
92 bool getEarlyFragmentTestsOptimization() const { return mEarlyFragmentTestsOptimization; }
93
94 int getNumViews() const { return mNumViews; }
95
96 Optional<PrimitiveMode> getGeometryShaderInputPrimitiveType() const
97 {
98 return mGeometryShaderInputPrimitiveType;
99 }
100
101 Optional<PrimitiveMode> getGeometryShaderOutputPrimitiveType() const
102 {
103 return mGeometryShaderOutputPrimitiveType;
104 }
105
106 Optional<GLint> geoGeometryShaderMaxVertices() const { return mGeometryShaderMaxVertices; }
107
108 Optional<GLint> getGeometryShaderInvocations() const { return mGeometryShaderInvocations; }
109
110 CompileStatus getCompileStatus() const { return mCompileStatus; }
111
112 private:
113 friend class Shader;
114
115 std::string mLabel;
116
117 ShaderType mShaderType;
118 int mShaderVersion;
119 std::string mTranslatedSource;
120 std::string mSource;
121
122 sh::WorkGroupSize mLocalSize;
123
124 std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> mInputVaryings;
125 std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> mOutputVaryings;
126 std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> mUniforms;
127 std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> mUniformBlocks;
128 std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> mShaderStorageBlocks;
129 std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> mAllAttributes;
130 std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> mActiveAttributes;
131 std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> mActiveOutputVariables;
132
133 bool mEarlyFragmentTestsOptimization;
134
135 // ANGLE_multiview.
136 int mNumViews;
137
138 // Geometry Shader.
139 Optional<PrimitiveMode> mGeometryShaderInputPrimitiveType;
140 Optional<PrimitiveMode> mGeometryShaderOutputPrimitiveType;
141 Optional<GLint> mGeometryShaderMaxVertices;
142 int mGeometryShaderInvocations;
143
144 // Indicates if this shader has been successfully compiled
145 CompileStatus mCompileStatus;
146};
147
148class Shader final : angle::NonCopyable, public LabeledObject
149{
150 public:
151 Shader(ShaderProgramManager *manager,
152 rx::GLImplFactory *implFactory,
153 const gl::Limitations &rendererLimitations,
154 ShaderType type,
155 ShaderProgramID handle);
156
157 void onDestroy(const Context *context);
158
159 void setLabel(const Context *context, const std::string &label) override;
160 const std::string &getLabel() const override;
161
162 ShaderType getType() const { return mType; }
163 ShaderProgramID getHandle() const;
164
165 rx::ShaderImpl *getImplementation() const { return mImplementation.get(); }
166
167 void setSource(GLsizei count, const char *const *string, const GLint *length);
168 int getInfoLogLength();
169 void getInfoLog(GLsizei bufSize, GLsizei *length, char *infoLog);
170 std::string getInfoLogString() const { return mInfoLog; }
171 int getSourceLength() const;
172 const std::string &getSourceString() const { return mState.getSource(); }
173 void getSource(GLsizei bufSize, GLsizei *length, char *buffer) const;
174 int getTranslatedSourceLength();
175 int getTranslatedSourceWithDebugInfoLength();
176 const std::string &getTranslatedSource();
177 void getTranslatedSource(GLsizei bufSize, GLsizei *length, char *buffer);
178 void getTranslatedSourceWithDebugInfo(GLsizei bufSize, GLsizei *length, char *buffer);
179
180 void compile(const Context *context);
181 bool isCompiled();
182 bool isCompleted();
183
184 void addRef();
185 void release(const Context *context);
186 unsigned int getRefCount() const;
187 bool isFlaggedForDeletion() const;
188 void flagForDeletion();
189 bool hasEarlyFragmentTestsOptimization() const
190 {
191 return mState.mEarlyFragmentTestsOptimization;
192 }
193
194 int getShaderVersion();
195
196 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getInputVaryings();
197 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getOutputVaryings();
198 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getUniforms();
199 const std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> &getUniformBlocks();
200 const std::vector<sh::InterfaceBlock> &getShaderStorageBlocks();
201 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getActiveAttributes();
202 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getAllAttributes();
203 const std::vector<sh::ShaderVariable> &getActiveOutputVariables();
204
205 // Returns mapped name of a transform feedback varying. The original name may contain array
206 // brackets with an index inside, which will get copied to the mapped name. The varying must be
207 // known to be declared in the shader.
208 std::string getTransformFeedbackVaryingMappedName(const std::string &tfVaryingName);
209
210 const sh::WorkGroupSize &getWorkGroupSize();
211
212 int getNumViews();
213
214 Optional<PrimitiveMode> getGeometryShaderInputPrimitiveType();
215 Optional<PrimitiveMode> getGeometryShaderOutputPrimitiveType();
216 int getGeometryShaderInvocations();
217 Optional<GLint> getGeometryShaderMaxVertices();
218
219 const std::string &getCompilerResourcesString() const;
220
221 const ShaderState &getState() const { return mState; }
222
223 GLuint getCurrentMaxComputeWorkGroupInvocations() const
224 {
225 return mCurrentMaxComputeWorkGroupInvocations;
226 }
227
228 unsigned int getMaxComputeSharedMemory() const { return mMaxComputeSharedMemory; }
229 bool hasBeenDeleted() const { return mDeleteStatus; }
230
231 private:
232 struct CompilingState;
233
234 ~Shader() override;
235 static void GetSourceImpl(const std::string &source,
236 GLsizei bufSize,
237 GLsizei *length,
238 char *buffer);
239
240 void resolveCompile();
241
242 ShaderState mState;
243 std::unique_ptr<rx::ShaderImpl> mImplementation;
244 const gl::Limitations mRendererLimitations;
245 const ShaderProgramID mHandle;
246 const ShaderType mType;
247 unsigned int mRefCount; // Number of program objects this shader is attached to
248 bool mDeleteStatus; // Flag to indicate that the shader can be deleted when no longer in use
249 std::string mInfoLog;
250
251 // We keep a reference to the translator in order to defer compiles while preserving settings.
252 BindingPointer<Compiler> mBoundCompiler;
253 std::unique_ptr<CompilingState> mCompilingState;
254 std::string mCompilerResourcesString;
255
256 ShaderProgramManager *mResourceManager;
257
258 GLuint mCurrentMaxComputeWorkGroupInvocations;
259 unsigned int mMaxComputeSharedMemory;
260};
261
262bool CompareShaderVar(const sh::ShaderVariable &x, const sh::ShaderVariable &y);
263
264const char *GetShaderTypeString(ShaderType type);
265} // namespace gl
266
267#endif // LIBANGLE_SHADER_H_
